author: USA TODAY, Elizabeth Weise, USA TODAY
title: Scientists chase two fronts in how to treat coronavirus but 'there's no magic drug right now'
description: Scientists are working to find effective COVID-19 treatments but caution not to self-medicate or hoard drugs like chloroqhine as possible candidates.
content:
Check out USA TODAY's Facebook Live Q&A series about the coronavirus. Topics include what to do if you feel sick and what protections do workers have.
USA TODAY
